    初涉Koa

    # 初涉Koa

    # ctx对象

    先来看看一个个体请求的ctx对象以及一些ctx的属性

    {
  "ctx": {
    "request": {
      "method": "GET",
      "url": "/article?author=hsq&id=452&classify=16",
      "header": {
        "host": "127.0.0.1:3000",
        "connection": "keep-alive",
        "cache-control": "max-age=0",
        "sec-ch-ua": "\" Not A;Brand\";v=\"99\", \"Chromium\";v=\"90\", \"Google Chrome\";v=\"90\"",
        "sec-ch-ua-mobile": "?0",
        "upgrade-insecure-requests": "1",
        "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/90.0.4430.85 Safari/537.36",
        "accept": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9",
        "sec-fetch-site": "none",
        "sec-fetch-mode": "navigate",
        "sec-fetch-user": "?1",
        "sec-fetch-dest": "document",
        "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate, br",
        "accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9",
        "cookie": "csrfToken=9C9OrFSH2CsNzRNLu_d9XnWQ"
      }
    },
    "response": {
      "status": 200,
      "message": "OK",
      "header": {
        "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8"
      }
    },
    "app": {
      "subdomainOffset": 2,
      "proxy": false,
      "env": "development"
    },
    "originalUrl": "/article?author=hsq&id=452&classify=16",
    "req": "<original node req>",
    "res": "<original node res>",
    "socket": "<original node socket>"
  },
  "url": "/article?author=hsq&id=452&classify=16",
  "req_query": {
    "author": "hsq",
    "id": "452",
    "classify": "16"
  },
  "req_querystring": "author=hsq&id=452&classify=16",
  "message": "下面是ctx:",
  "ctx_query": {
    "author": "hsq",
    "id": "452",
    "classify": "16"
  },
  "ctx_querystring": "author=hsq&id=452&classify=16"
}
